LanguageData.DankPyon_Make_MincedApple.label: make apple mince
LanguageData.DankPyon_Make_WortAle.label: make ale wort
LanguageData.DankPyon_Make_WortAle.description: Make ale wort by boiling wheat.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeMustWine.label: make grape must
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeMustWine.description: Make grape must by crushing grapes. Needs to undergo fermentation in order to become wine.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeMustMulberry.label: make mulberry must
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeMustMulberry.description: Make mulberry must by crushing mulberries. Needs to undergo fermentation in order to become wine.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeMustGriffon.label: make griffon berry must
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeMustGriffon.description: Make griffon berry must by crushing griffon berries. Needs to undergo fermentation in order to become wine.
